articles.title: Poco M3 Pro 5G Launch in India Today: How to Watch Livestream, Expected Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Poco M3 Pro 5G is set to launch in India today, June 8, at 11:30am through a virtual event that will be livestreamed on the company’s YouTube channel and Instagram social account. The phone debuted in the European market last month.
